Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator

Interface Summary
BeanValidator Implements a bean validator.
Message  
Outjector This class is responsible for outjecting request parameter to the next request.
 

Class Summary
AbstractValidator Implements the Validator shortcut methods.
DefaultOutjector Default implementation for Outjector.
DefaultValidator The default validator implementation.
Hibernate Deprecated. Use the BeanValidator.
HibernateValidator3 Implements the BeanValidator using the Hibernate Validator 3.x.
I18nMessage In this Message implementation, the message is i18n'ed while the category is literal.
JSR303TraversableResolver A custom TraversableResolver to bootstrap Bean Validation avoiding classpath problems with Hibernate Validator 4 and JPA2.
JSR303Validator Implements the BeanValidator using the JSR303 - BeanValidation.
JSR303ValidatorFactory Bring up JSR303 Bean Validation factory.
MagicMapOutjector An implementation for Outjector.
MessageInterpolatorFactory Factory for JSR303 MessageInterpolator
NullBeanValidator A bean validator that does nothing
ReplicatorOutjector Outjector implementation that replicates logic parameters to next logic
ValidationMessage A simple validation message.
Validations Hamcrest based validation support.
ValidatorFactoryCreator Factory for JSR303 ValidatorFactory
 

Exception Summary
DefaultValidationException VRaptor's default implementation of a ValidationException.
InvalidValidationProcess Some exception ocurred during the validation process, which makes it an invalid validation process.
ValidationException If some validation error occur, its encapsulated within an instance of ValidationException, which is then throw and parsed.
